languages.text: "Что касается лично меня... Я скромный слуга Императора и верноподданный Вольного Торговца. И, к моему величайшему удовольствию, я имел честь называться близким другом Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "Что касается лично меня... Я скромный слуга Императора и верноподданный Вольного Торговца. И, к моему величайшему удовольствию, я имел честь называться близким другом Леди Теодоры".

languages.text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."
languages.original_text: "Что касается лично меня... Я скромный слуга Императора и верноподданный Вольного Торговца. И, к моему величайшему удовольствию, я имел честь называться близким другом Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honor of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."
"As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honor of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."
"As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."
"As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."
"As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

languages.text: “至于我个人嘛……我是帝皇卑微的仆人，也是行商浪人的忠诚臣民。而且，我有幸能成为西奥多拉夫人的亲密伙伴，这让我非常开心。”
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: “至于我个人嘛……我是帝皇卑微的仆人，也是行商浪人的忠诚臣民。而且，我有幸能成为西奥多拉夫人的亲密伙伴，这让我非常开心。”

languages.text: «En cuanto a mí, personalmente... soy un humilde siervo del Emperador y un fiel súbdito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. También tuve el honor de ser amigo íntimo de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a mí, personalmente... soy un humilde siervo del Emperador y un fiel súbdito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. También tuve el honor de ser amigo íntimo de lady Theodora».

languages.text: 「私自身は…皇帝の従順な召使いであり、自由開拓者の忠実な臣下であります。名誉あることに、シオドーラ様の親友とも呼ばれています」
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: 「私自身は…皇帝の従順な召使いであり、自由開拓者の忠実な臣下であります。名誉あることに、シオドーラ様の親友とも呼ばれています」

languages.text: "Was mich persönlich angeht ... Ich bin ein bescheidener Diener des Imperators und ein loyaler Untertan {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Und ich hatte zu meiner großen Freude die Ehre, mich als engen Freund von Lady Theodora bezeichnen zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: "Was mich persönlich angeht ... Ich bin ein bescheidener Diener des Imperators und ein loyaler Untertan {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Und ich hatte zu meiner großen Freude die Ehre, mich als engen Freund von Lady Theodora bezeichnen zu dürfen."

languages.text: « Quant à moi... je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur de l'Empereur et un sujet loyal {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. J'ai également eu l'honneur et le plaisir immenses de faire partie des amis proches de dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à moi... je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur de l'Empereur et un sujet loyal {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. J'ai également eu l'honneur et le plaisir immenses de faire partie des amis proches de dame Théodora. »

languages.text: "Ben ise İmpartor'un naçiz bir hizmetkârı, Hür Tacir'in de sadık bir kuluyum. Ayrıca ne mutlu bana ki kendimi Leydi Theodora'nın yakın bir dostu olarak addedebilme onuruna sahiptim."
languages.original_text: "As for me personally... I am a humble servant of the Emperor and a loyal subject of the Rogue Trader. And, to my great pleasure, I had the honour of calling myself Lady Theodora's close friend."

traits.locale_text: "Ben ise, İmpartor'un naçiz bir hizmetkârı ve Hür Tacir'in sadık bir kuluyum. Ayrıca ne mutlu bana ki kendimi Leydi Theodora'nın yakın bir arkadaşı olarak addedebilme onuruna eriştim."
